item.description:
Singles Mingle Shmooze and Shmear Breakfast on
Sunday, May 31 10:00-noon
Bagels, cream cheese, lox, coffee and conversation


We hope to see YOU !
Inviting all Jewish singles 40+,50+ and 60+


Sunday – May 31, 2009 10:00 am-12:00 noon
Temple Beth Am - 300 Pleasant Street – Framingham

Email~ singlesmingle18@aol.com now to make a reservation
Leave your name, your phone number, and number attending
Please RSVP, so that we know how many bagels to get!

Cost - $7.00 with a reservation
$9.00 without a reservation/at the door
item.name: Singles Mingle Bagel Breakfast - TO RSVP SEE "DETAILS" BELOW
